articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: USWNT weren't fully prepared at Women's World Cup - Horan - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: The U.S. women's soccer team was not fully prepared heading into the World Cup, co-captain Lindsey Horan said, after the four-time champions produced their worst World Cup performance at the tournament in Australia and New Zealand.
articles.content:
Aug 23, 2023, 05:37 AM ET
The United States women's national team was not fully prepared heading into the World Cup, co-captain Lindsey Horan said, after the four-time champions produced their worst… [+1641 chars]
